title: Find this font for me
content:
Please find this font for me. Its urgent

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/09fc6b01edd590d17b45f23a1c4da7f2_4115.5111.png)
author: forjob29

comments.content: Your sample is too small to identify

Here is another sample. Please i need to identify it to put it in my software

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dd_5096.jpg)

This is a duplicate of your request in [http://typophile.com/node/114936](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190701/http:/typophile.com/node/114936 "http://typophile.com/node/114936")  
Also please use only the new type ID board for font ID requests [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190701/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Don

Sorry donshottype. I did not know about the new type ID board before i posted in here. Anyway thanks for letting me know. Anyway the other ID request has not yet been successful identifying the font name I was looking for. Please let me know the font in the post if possible. Once again Kudos for all of you.
